== XSLT
_XSLT_ allows converting XML into other formats. XSLT stands for _ Extensible Stylesheet Language for Transformations _ . You typically run _XLST_ from the command line but there is also tooling available for graphical tools, like the Eclipse IDE.
For an introduction to XML please see http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/JavaXML/article.html[ Java and XML Tutorial
.
